trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables the server to gather information about the capabilities of the browser that has made the current request.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 HTTP 內建物件，可讓伺服器收集已發出目前要求之瀏覽器功能的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>類別，並做為包裝函式<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別。

trans-unit.source: This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class and exposes the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開的功能<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別並公開<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>類別可讓您取代的原始實作<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。

trans-unit.source: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.
trans-unit.target: 由這個包裝函式提供存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="httpBrowserCapabilities" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="httpBrowserCapabilities" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser is capable of supporting ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否能夠支援 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser can support ActiveX controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器可以支援 ActiveX 控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of available control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用控制項配接器的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of registered control adapters for the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器之已註冊的控制項配接器集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the browser to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的瀏覽器名稱。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to add an entry to the internal collection of browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 在內部用來將項目加入已辨識其功能之瀏覽器的內部集合中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client is an America Online (AOL) browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端是否為 America Online (AOL) 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is an AOL browser; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是 AOL 瀏覽器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports playing background sounds by using the <see langword="bgsounds" /> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援使用 <see langword="bgsounds" /> HTML 項目播放背景音效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports playing background sounds; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援播放背景音效，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser is a beta version.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出瀏覽器是否為 Beta 版的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is a beta version; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是 Beta 版，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the browser string (if any) that was sent by the browser in the <see langword="User-Agent" /> request header.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器字串 (如果存在)，該字串由瀏覽器在 <see langword="User-Agent" /> 要求標頭傳送。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <see langword="User-Agent" /> request header sent by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 由瀏覽器傳送之 <see langword="User-Agent" /> 要求標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 取得可識別其功能的瀏覽器集合。

trans-unit.source: The browsers for which capabilities are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 可識別其功能的瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports decks that contain multiple forms, such as separate cards.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援包含多個表單的 Deck，例如個別的卡。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports decks that contain multiple forms; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援包含多個表單的 Deck，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser device is capable of initiating a voice call.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示瀏覽器裝置是否可初始化語音電話的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser device is capable of initiating a voice call; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器裝置可初始化語音電話，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports page content that follows WML <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援遵循 WML <see langword="select" /> 或 <see langword="input" /> 項目的網頁內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports page content that follows HTML <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果瀏覽器支援遵循 HTML 網頁內容<see langword="select" />或<see langword="input" />項目，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports empty HTML <see langword="select" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援空的 HTML <see langword="select" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports empty HTML <see langword="select" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援空的 HTML <see langword="select" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="input" /> and <see langword="select" /> elements together in the same card.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否同時支援同一張卡中的 WML <see langword="input" /> 和 <see langword="select" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="input" /> and <see langword="select" /> elements together; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器同時支援 WML <see langword="input" /> 和 <see langword="select" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="option" /> elements that specify both <see langword="onpick" /> and <see langword="value" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援同時指定 <see langword="onpick" /> 和 <see langword="value" /> 屬性的 WML <see langword="option" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="option" /> elements that specify both <see langword="onpick" /> and <see langword="value" /> attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援同時指定 <see langword="onpick" /> 和 <see langword="value" /> 屬性的 WML <see langword="option" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="onevent" /> and <see langword="prev" /> elements in the same card.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援同一張卡中的 WML <see langword="onevent" /> 和 <see langword="prev" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="onevent" /> and <see langword="prev" /> elements in the same card; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援同一張卡中的 WML <see langword="onevent" /> 和 <see langword="prev" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML cards for postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 WML 卡進行回傳。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML cards for postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 WML 卡進行回傳，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports WML <see langword="setvar" /> elements that have a <see langword="value" /> attribute of 0.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 <see langword="value" /> 屬性為 0 的 WML <see langword="setvar" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports WML <see langword="setvar" /> elements that have a <see langword="value" /> attribute of 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 <see langword="value" /> 屬性為 0 的 WML <see langword="setvar" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports sending email messages by using the HTML <see langword="mailto" /> scheme.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援使用 HTML <see langword="mailto" /> 配置來傳送電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports sending email message by using the HTML <see langword="mailto" /> scheme; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 瀏覽器是否支援使用 HTML 傳送電子郵件訊息<see langword="mailto" />配置; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to get the defined capabilities of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 內部使用，以取得瀏覽器已定義的功能。

trans-unit.source: The defined capabilities of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器已定義的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports Channel Definition Format (CDF) for webcasting.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，其中該值指出瀏覽器是否支援網路廣播的頻道定義格式 (CDF)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports CDF; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 CDF，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the .NET Framework that is installed on the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得用戶端上安裝的 .NET Framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLRS) version.
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime (CLRS) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The first filter to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The second filter to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to compare filters.
trans-unit.target: 在內部用來比較篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: 1 if <paramref name="filter1" /> is a parent of <paramref name="filter2" />; -1 if <paramref name="filter2" /> is a parent of <paramref name="filter1" />; or 0 if there is no parent-child relationship between <paramref name="filter1" /> and <paramref name="filter2" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="filter1" /> 是 <paramref name="filter2" /> 的父代，則為 1；如果 <paramref name="filter2" /> 是 <paramref name="filter1" /> 的父代，則為 -1；如果 <paramref name="filter1" /> 和 <paramref name="filter2" /> 之間沒有任何父子式關聯性，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser is capable of supporting cookies.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser can support cookies; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器能夠支援 Cookie，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether cookies are currently enabled in the browser, only whether the browser can support cookies.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出瀏覽器目前是否已啟用 Cookie，只會指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser is a search-engine Web crawler.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出該瀏覽器是否為搜尋引擎網頁編目程式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is a search-engine crawler; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是搜尋引擎 Crawler，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object to use to render markup to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件的新執行個體，用來呈現瀏覽器標記。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when creating the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of submit buttons that are allowed for a form.
trans-unit.target: 取得對於表單所允許之送出按鈕的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of submit buttons that are allowed for a form.
trans-unit.target: 對於表單所允許之送出按鈕的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to disable use of an optimized cache key.
trans-unit.target: 在內部使用以停止使用最佳化的快取索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of ECMAScript (JavaScript) that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器所支援 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的版本編號。

trans-unit.source: The version number of ECMAScript (JavaScript) that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器所支援 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 的版本編號。

trans-unit.source: The filter to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to evaluate a filter.
trans-unit.target: 在內部使用以評估篩選。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter was successfully evaluated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功評估篩選條件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports HTML frames.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 HTML 架構。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports frames; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援框架，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the major version number of the wireless gateway that is used to access the server, if known.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來存取伺服器的無線閘道主要版本號碼 (如果知道)。

trans-unit.source: The major version number of the wireless gateway that is used to access the server, if known.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minor version number of the wireless gateway that is used to access the server, if known.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來存取伺服器之無線閘道的次要版本號碼 (如果已知)。

trans-unit.source: The minor version number of the wireless gateway that is used to access the server, if known.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the wireless gateway that is used to access the server, if known.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來存取伺服器的無線閘道版本 (如果知道的話)。

trans-unit.source: The default is "None".

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser has a dedicated Back button.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否具有專用的 [上一步] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser has a dedicated Back button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器具有專屬的 [上一頁] 按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the scrollbar of an HTML <see langword="select multiple" /> element that has an <see langword="align" /> attribute value of <see langword="right" /> is obscured upon rendering.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the scrollbar of an HTML <see langword="select multiple" /> element that has an <see langword="align" /> attribute value of <see langword="right" /> is obscured upon rendering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal identifier of the browser as specified in the browser definition file.

trans-unit.source: The internal identifier of the browser as specified in the browser definition file.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器定義檔中所指定瀏覽器的內部識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of input that is supported by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器支援的輸入類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of input supported by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援的輸入類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is "telephoneKeypad".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "telephoneKeypad"。

trans-unit.source: The specified browser.
trans-unit.target: 指定的瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client browser is the same as the specified browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出用戶端瀏覽器和指定的瀏覽器是否相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client browser is the same as the specified browser; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端瀏覽器和指定瀏覽器相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser has a color display.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值表示瀏覽器是否具有色彩顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser has a color display; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器具有色彩顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser is a recognized mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否為已辨識的行動裝置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is a recognized mobile device; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器是可辨認的行動裝置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the browser capability to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的瀏覽器功能名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified browser capability.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之瀏覽器功能的值。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這個屬性是類別的索引子。

trans-unit.source: The browser capability with the specified key name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定索引鍵名稱的瀏覽器功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports Java.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 Java。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports Java; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 Java，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether Java is currently enabled in the browser, only whether the browser can support Java.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出瀏覽器目前是否已啟用 Java，只會指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 Java。

trans-unit.source: Gets the JScript version that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器支援的 JScript 版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of JScript that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器所支援的 JScript 版本。

trans-unit.source: For version number of ECMAScript supported by the browser, see <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援的 ECMAScript 版本編號，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the major (integer) version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器的主要 (整數) 版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The major version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的主要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum length in characters for the <see langword="href" /> attribute of an HTML <see langword="a" /> (anchor) element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 HTML <see langword="href" /> (錨定 (Anchor)) 項目 <see langword="a" /> 屬性的最大字元長度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length in characters for the <see langword="href" /> attribute of an HTML <see langword="a" /> (anchor) element.
trans-unit.target: HTML <see langword="href" /> (錨定) 項目 <see langword="a" /> 屬性的最大字元長度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the value in the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper.Item(System.String)" /> property with the key name of "maximumHrefLength".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesWrapper.Item(System.String)" /> 屬性中的值，其索引鍵名稱為 "maximumHrefLength"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum length of the page, in bytes, that the browser can display.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器可以顯示的最大頁面長度 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the page, in bytes, that the browser can display.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器可以顯示的最大頁面長度 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>2000</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>2000年</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum length of the text that a soft-key label can display.
trans-unit.target: 取得螢幕按鍵標籤可以顯示的文字最大長度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the text that a soft-key label can display.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕按鍵標籤可以顯示的文字最大長度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 5。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minor (decimal) version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器的次要 (小數) 版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The minor version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的次要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minor (decimal) version number of the browser as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器的次要 (小數) 版本號碼並以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the minor version number of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表瀏覽器的次要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the manufacturer of a mobile device, if known.
trans-unit.target: 取得行動裝置的製造商名稱 (如果已知)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the manufacturer of a mobile device, if known.
trans-unit.target: 行動裝置的製造商名稱 (如果已知)。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Unknown".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 "Unknown"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the model name of a mobile device, if known.
trans-unit.target: 取得行動裝置的型號名稱 (如果已知)。

trans-unit.source: The model name of a mobile device, if known.
trans-unit.target: 行動裝置的型號名稱 (如果已知)。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Unknown".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 "Unknown"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the Microsoft HTML (MSHTML) Document Object Model (DOM) that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器支援的 Microsoft HTML (MSHTML) 文件物件模型 (DOM) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The MSHTML DOM version that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援的 MSHTML DOM 版本。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of softkeys on a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 取得行動裝置上的螢幕按鍵數。

trans-unit.source: The number of softkeys supported on a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 行動裝置上所支援的螢幕按鍵數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the operating system that the client is using, if known.
trans-unit.target: 在已知情況下取得用戶端所使用的作業系統名稱。

trans-unit.source: The operating system that the client is using, if known, otherwise the value is set to "Unknown".
trans-unit.target: 在已知情況下用戶端所使用的作業系統，否則請將值設為「未知」。

trans-unit.source: Gets the MIME type of the type of image content that the browser typically prefers.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器通常慣用之影像內容類型的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The MIME type of the type of image content that the browser typically prefers.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器通常慣用之影像內容類型的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is "image/gif".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 "image/gif"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the MIME type of the type of content that the browser typically prefers.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器通常慣用的內容類型的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The MIME type of the type of content that the browser typically prefers.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器通常慣用的內容類型的 MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is "text/html".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 "text/html"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the general name for the type of content that the browser prefers.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器所慣用內容類型的一般名稱。

trans-unit.source: The values "html32" or "chtml10".
trans-unit.target: "html32" 或 "chtml10" 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is "html32".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 "html32"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the request encoding that the browser prefers.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器慣用的要求編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The request encoding preferred by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器慣用的要求編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response encoding that the browser prefers.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器慣用的回應編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The response encoding preferred by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器慣用的回應編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser renders a line break before <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否在 <see langword="select" /> 或 <see langword="input" /> 項目之前呈現分行符號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser renders a line break before <see langword="select" /> or <see langword="input" /> elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="select" /> 項目之前呈現分行符號，則為 <see langword="input" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser renders a line break after list-item elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否在清單項目之後呈現分行符號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser renders a line break after list-item elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在清單項目之後呈現分行符號，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser renders a line break after a standalone WML <see langword="a" /> (anchor) element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否在獨立 WML <see langword="a" /> (錨定) 項目之後呈現分行符號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser renders a line break after a standalone WML <see langword="a" /> (anchor) element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在獨立 WML <see langword="true" /> (錨定) 項目之後呈現分行符號，則為 <see langword="a" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser renders a line break after a WML <see langword="input" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否在 WML <see langword="input" /> 項目之後呈現分行符號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser renders a line break after a WML <see langword="input" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在 WML <see langword="true" /> 項目之後呈現分行符號，則為 <see langword="input" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the mobile-device browser renders a WML <see langword="do" /> form accept construct as an inline button instead of as a softkey.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示行動裝置瀏覽器是否將 WML <see langword="do" /> 表單接受建構呈現為內嵌按鈕，而非螢幕按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mobile-device browser renders a WML <see langword="do" /> form-accept construct as an inline button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行動裝置瀏覽器將 WML <see langword="true" /> 表單接受建構呈現為內嵌按鈕，則為 <see langword="do" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser renders WML <see langword="select" /> elements as menu cards, instead of as a combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否將 WML <see langword="select" /> 項目呈現為功能表卡，而非下拉式方塊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser renders WML <see langword="select" /> elements as menu cards; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器將 WML <see langword="true" /> 項目呈現為功能表卡，則為 <see langword="select" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to produce a meta-tag that is required by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 在內部用來產生某些瀏覽器所需的中繼標籤。

trans-unit.source: A meta-tag that is required by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 某些瀏覽器所需的中繼標籤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires colons in element attribute values to be replaced with a different character.
trans-unit.target: 取得會指出瀏覽器是否需要以不同的字元取代項目屬性值中之冒號的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires colons in element attribute values to be replaced with a different character; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要以不同字元取代項目屬性值中的冒號，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires an HTML <see langword="meta" /> element for which the <see langword="content-type" /> attribute is specified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否需要指定 <see langword="meta" /> 屬性的 HTML <see langword="content-type" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires an HTML <see langword="meta" /> element for which the <see langword="content-type" /> attribute is specified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要指定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性的 HTML <see langword="meta" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="content-type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires control state to be maintained in sessions.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否需要在工作階段中維持控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires control state to be maintained in sessions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要在工作階段中維持控制狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires a double-byte character set.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示瀏覽器是否需要雙位元組字元集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires a double-byte character set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要雙位元組字元集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires nonstandard error messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否需要非標準的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires nonstandard error messages; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要非標準錯誤訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser requires the first element in the body of a Web page to be an HTML <see langword="br" /> element.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser requires the first element in the body of a Web page to be an HTML <see langword="br" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器需要網頁主體的第一個項目為 HTML <see langword="true" /> 項目，則為 <see langword="br" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser does not support HTML <see langword="br" /> elements to format line breaks.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports telephone dialing based on plain text, or whether it requires special markup.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the browser supports Visual Basic Scripting edition (VBScript).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出瀏覽器是否支援 Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser supports VBScript; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器支援 VBScript，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether VBScript is currently enabled in the browser, only whether the browser can support VBScript.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出瀏覽器目前是否已啟用 VBScript，只會指出瀏覽器是否能夠支援 VBScript。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full version number (integer and decimal) of the browser as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得瀏覽器的完整版本號碼 (整數和小數) 並以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The full version number of the browser as a string.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器的完整版本號碼並以字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Document Object Model (DOM) that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得該瀏覽器支援的全球資訊網協會 (W3C) XML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 版本。

trans-unit.source: The number of the W3C XML DOM version number that the browser supports.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援的 W3C XML DOM 版本編號。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client is a Win16-based computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端是否為 Win16 電腦。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the browser is running on a Win16-based computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器在 Win16 架構電腦執行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client is a Win32-based computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端是否為 Win32 電腦。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client is a Win32-based computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端是 Win32 電腦，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。
